contact.name: The open API platform by Mercedes-Benz

info.description: The Dealer API provides Dealer search functions.
info.title: Dealer

tags.description: Resources that provide search functions for dealers (dealer, garage, retailer, etc.) based on given attributes.
tags.name: Dealer search

tags.description: Reference data that is required for the Dealer API.
tags.name: References

get.description: This request returns the countries supported by the Dealer API

parameters.description: The index of the page to be returned. If this parameter is omitted, the first page will be returned.
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: The index of the page to be returned. If this parameter is omitted, the first page will be returned.
parameters.name: pageSize

400.description:
Invalid parameter was specified:
 * Page is not valid
 * Page size is not valid

401.description:
Unauthorized:
  * Failed to resolve API Key query parameter
  * Invalid API Key

get.description: This request returns dealers (dealer, garage, retailer, etc.) for given parameters

parameters.description: Array of dealer ids. The dealer id is dealer’s business key, also known as GS Id. e.g. GS0000857,GS0017621
parameters.name: dealerIds

parameters.description: The radius value of the search area. The center of the search area is defined by geo coordinates. (latitude, longitude properties) If radiusValue and radiusUnit parameters are missing, then the default radius is 10 km.
parameters.name: radiusValue

parameters.description: The radius unit of the search area. The center of the search area is defined by geo coordinates. (latitude, longitude properties) If radiusValue and radiusUnit parameters are missing, then the default radius is 10 km.
parameters.name: radiusUnit

parameters.description: The country of the dealer address defined as ISO two letter ID (e.g. DE, CH, CN, etc.)
parameters.name: countryIsoCode

parameters.description: The city of the dealer address.
parameters.name: city

parameters.description: A name of the dealer, the name filter will be applied to all Dealer names (e.g. legalName, nameAddition). You can also search for parts of Dealer names, e.g. the search term 'Niederlassung' will also match 'Niederlassung Stuttgart'.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description:
Filter by brand, valid values are:
  * MB: Mercedes-Benz
  * SMT: Smart
parameters.name: brand

parameters.description:
Filter by activity, valid actitvity values are:
  * PARTS: Spare Parts Sales
  * SALES: Sales of new vehicles
  * SERVICE: Maintaining and repair
  * USED-VEHICLES-TRADE: Sales of used vehicles
parameters.name: activity

parameters.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned. e.g. fields=dealers(dealerId,address(street,city))
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: The index of the page to be returned. If this parameter is omitted, the first page will be returned.
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: The index of the page to be returned. If this parameter is omitted, the first page will be returned.
parameters.name: pageSize

204.description: The search did not match any dealers.

400.description:
Invalid parameter was specified:
 * DealerId is not valid
 * Area search is not valid (latitude or longitude missing or invalid)
 * Country ISO code is not valid
 * Brand code is not valid
 * Product group is not valid
 * Activity is not valid
 * Page is not valid
 * Page size is not valid

401.description:
Unauthorized:
  * Failed to resolve API Key query parameter
  * Invalid API Key

get.description: This request returns dealers for given parameters

parameters.description: The dealer id is dealer’s business key, also known as GS Id. e.g. GS0000857
parameters.name: dealerId

parameters.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned. e.g. fields=dealerId,address(street,city)
parameters.name: fields

400.description: Invalid format for parameter dealerId was specified

401.description:
Unauthorized:
  * Failed to resolve API Key query parameter
  * Invalid API Key

activity.description:
Filter by activity, valid actitvity values are:
  * PARTS: Spare Parts Sales
  * SALES: Sales of new vehicles
  * SERVICE: Maintaining and repair
  * USED-VEHICLES-TRADE: Sales of used vehicles
activity.name: activity

brand.description:
Filter by brand, valid values are:
  * MB: Mercedes-Benz
  * SMT: Smart
brand.name: brand

city.description: The city of the dealer address.
city.name: city

countryIsoCode.description: The country of the dealer address defined as ISO two letter ID (e.g. DE, CH, CN, etc.)
countryIsoCode.name: countryIsoCode

dealerId.description: The dealer id is dealer’s business key, also known as GS Id. e.g. GS0000857
dealerId.name: dealerId

dealerIds.description: Array of dealer ids. The dealer id is dealer’s business key, also known as GS Id. e.g. GS0000857,GS0017621
dealerIds.name: dealerIds

fieldsForDealer.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned. e.g. fields=dealerId,address(street,city)
fieldsForDealer.name: fields

fieldsForDealers.description: Specifies which fields should be included in the result. If this filter is not used, per default all fields are returned. e.g. fields=dealers(dealerId,address(street,city))
fieldsForDealers.name: fields

legalName.description: A name of the dealer, the name filter will be applied to all Dealer names (e.g. legalName, nameAddition). You can also search for parts of Dealer names, e.g. the search term 'Niederlassung' will also match 'Niederlassung Stuttgart'.
legalName.name: name

page.description: The index of the page to be returned. If this parameter is omitted, the first page will be returned.
page.name: page

pageSize.description: The index of the page to be returned. If this parameter is omitted, the first page will be returned.
pageSize.name: pageSize

radiusUnit.description: The radius unit of the search area. The center of the search area is defined by geo coordinates. (latitude, longitude properties) If radiusValue and radiusUnit parameters are missing, then the default radius is 10 km.
radiusUnit.name: radiusUnit

radiusValue.description: The radius value of the search area. The center of the search area is defined by geo coordinates. (latitude, longitude properties) If radiusValue and radiusUnit parameters are missing, then the default radius is 10 km.
radiusValue.name: radiusValue

code.description:
The activity of the dealer, valid actitvity values are:
  * PARTS: Spare Parts Sales
  * SALES: Sales of new vehicles
  * SERVICE: Maintaining and repair
  * USED-VEHICLES-TRADE: Sales of used vehicles

street.description: street and house number, if applicable

brandCodes.description: network brand codes of the dealer, dealer numbers

functions.description: list of functions for the dealer

openingHours.description:
List of opening hours for each customer relevant function for
each day

HalifiedCountries.description: countries and navigation links for additional results.

code.description:
The product group code, valid values are:
  * PASSENGER-CAR
  * VAN

Weekdays.description:
opening hours for a week, represented by a map where the key
is a weekday and the value is an object containing the time periods. There
are a maximum of two time slots for each day. If there exists no opening
hours for one day, they will be shown as closed.
